org.mt4j.input
Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.input.InputManager

public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the InputSources and Inputprocessors for each scene. Starts up the default input sources.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

          Instantiates a new input manager.
